weekDays.description: Days of the week that the job should execute on.

monthDays.description: Days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1 and 31.

monthlyOccurrences.description: Occurrences of days within a month.

AdvancedSchedule.description: The properties of the create Advanced Schedule.

occurrence.description: Occurrence of the week within the month. Must be between 1 and 5

day.description: Day of the occurrence. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.

AdvancedScheduleMonthlyOccurrence.description: The properties of the create advanced schedule monthly occurrence.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the connection.

connectionType.description: Gets or sets the connectionType of the connection.

fieldDefinitionValues.description: Gets or sets the field definition properties of the connection.

ConnectionCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create connection properties

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection type.

ConnectionTypeAssociationProperty.description: The connection type property associated with the entity.

isGlobal.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate if the connection type is global.

fieldDefinitions.description: Gets or sets the field definitions of the connection type.

ConnectionTypeCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create connection type.

algorithm.description: Gets or sets the content hash algorithm used to hash the content.

value.description: Gets or sets expected hash value of the content.

ContentHash.description: Definition of the runbook property type.

uri.description: Gets or sets the uri of the runbook content.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

type.description: Gets or sets the content source type.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the content. This is based on the content source type.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

userName.description: Gets or sets the user name of the credential.

password.description: Gets or sets the password of the credential.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the credential.

logProgress.description: Gets or sets progress log option.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the configuration parameters.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the configuration.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

isMandatory.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate whether the parameter is madatory or not.

position.description: Get or sets the position of the parameter.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value of parameter.

DscConfigurationParameter.description: Definition of the configuration parameter type.

isEncrypted.description: Gets or sets the isEncrypted flag of the connection field definition.

isOptional.description: Gets or sets the isOptional flag of the connection field definition.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the connection field definition.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the runOn which specifies the group name where the job is to be executed.

JobCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create job operation.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the hybrid worker group that the scheduled job should run on.

parameters.description: Gets or sets a list of job properties.

JobScheduleCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create job schedule operation.

contentLink.description: Gets or sets the module content link.

ModuleCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update module properties.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.

RunbookAssociationProperty.description: The runbook property associated with the entity.

logVerbose.description: Gets or sets verbose log option.

logProgress.description: Gets or sets progress log option.

runbookType.description: Gets or sets the type of the runbook.

draft.description: Gets or sets the draft runbook properties.

publishContentLink.description: Gets or sets the published runbook content link.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the runbook.

logActivityTrace.description: Gets or sets the activity-level tracing options of the runbook.

inEdit.description: Gets or sets whether runbook is in edit mode.

draftContentLink.description: Gets or sets the draft runbook content link.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time of the runbook draft.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time of the runbook draft.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the runbook draft parameters.

outputTypes.description: Gets or sets the runbook output types.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

isMandatory.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate whether the parameter is madatory or not.

position.description: Get or sets the position of the parameter.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value of parameter.

RunbookParameter.description: Definition of the runbook parameter type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the schedule.

ScheduleAssociationProperty.description: The schedule property associated with the entity.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the schedule.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the schedule.

expiryTime.description: Gets or sets the end time of the schedule.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval of the schedule.

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the time zone of the schedule.

ScheduleCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update schedule operation.

name.description: Gets or sets the SKU name of the account.

family.description: Gets or sets the SKU family.

capacity.description: Gets or sets the SKU capacity.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the variable.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the variable.

isEncrypted.description: Gets or sets the encrypted flag of the variable.

VariableCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create variable operation.

executionFrequencyInSeconds.description: Gets or sets the frequency at which the watcher is invoked.

scriptName.description: Gets or sets the name of the script the watcher is attached to, i.e. the name of an existing runbook.

scriptParameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the script.

scriptRunOn.description: Gets or sets the name of the hybrid worker group the watcher will run on.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets the value of the enabled flag of webhook.

expiryTime.description: Gets or sets the expiry time.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the name of the hybrid worker group the webhook job will run on.

WebhookCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create webhook operation.
